title: Can't access the "My Updates" page (still)
body:
So I've had this issue literally for as long as I can remember on these boards, and have made posts a couple times now trying to solve it.

Basically whenever I click on the button at the top of the page that looks like a text box and links to "https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/myupdates " it instead sends me to the "Boards Home" page at "https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/ "

I've tried this on my laptop, phone, and public computers.  I have no idea what could have caused this, but it is obviously annoying.

Thanks to anyone who is willing to try and solve this.

replies.body: Hmmmm that is kinda weird. That button is still working correctly on my end as well as others I've tested so we know that link it's just borked. I wonder if some of your browser settings might be messing with the redirection, so I say we try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly.

Tried that just now (tried it before too), didn't work.

Here's one of the posts I've done where people have given suggestions. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/14Uwlwr9-my-updates-speech-bubble-link-just-goes-to-boards-home

And another https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2REi5Lpb-cant-access-my-updates-page-on-na-boards

Guess I'll try submitting a ticket again.  I can't remember what happened last time.
The only times I can access the page is when I have somewhere around 25-30 unread replies, and as soon as I leave it after that, the counter is down to 2 or 3 and I can't access the page again.
